Package game

Class Bot

java.lang.Object
game.Player
game.Bot
public class Bot extends Player
Represents an AI-controlled player (bot) in the labyrinth game.

  • Constructor Summary

    • Bot

      public Bot(String nome, Divisao inicio, Dificuldade inteligencia, LabyrinthGraph<Divisao> mapa)
      Creates a new Bot with a given name, starting room, difficulty, and known map.
      Parameters:
      nome - the bot's name
      inicio - the starting division (room) of the bot
      inteligencia - the bot's intelligence/difficulty level
      mapa - the labyrinth graph known by the bot

      Parameters:

      numAlavancas - the total number of levers
      Returns:
